adventures.name: Curse of Strahd
adventures.description: The adventurers are trapped in the land of Barovia by the vampire Strahd von Zarovich, and must find a way to escape and defeat him.

adventures.name: Lost Mine of Phandelver
adventures.description: An introductory adventure for new players, the characters explore the town of Phandalin and uncover the mysteries of the Wave Echo Cave.

adventures.name: Out of the Abyss
adventures.description: The adventurers are caught in the Underdark, struggling to escape and prevent the Demon Lords from spreading chaos across the surface world.

adventures.name: Tomb of Annihilation
adventures.description: In the deadly jungles of Chult, the adventurers must find and destroy the Soulmonger, a device that traps the souls of the dead.

adventures.name: Hoard of the Dragon Queen
adventures.description: The characters race against time to prevent the Cult of the Dragon from releasing Tiamat from the Nine Hells.
